articles.title: Kim Jong Il Inspects Taehongdan County
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Inspects Taehongdan County
Pyongyang, May 19 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il gave field guidance to Taehongdan County of Ryanggang Province.
					 The first leg of his guidance was the Paeksan Pig Farm under the county agricultural management committee.
					
					 Being briefed on the farm before a huge map showing its panoramic view, he went round the interior and exterior of the farm to acquaint himself in detail with its construction, technical equipment and breeding conditions.
					
					 He highly appreciated the devoted efforts made by the officials and employees of the farm for the prosperity of the country, expressing great satisfaction over the fact that they turned the farm into a modern pork production center by their own efforts and with their own technology in a brief span of time.
					
					 Noting that the farm is a modern pork production centre as a high level of quality was ensured in its construction and all its processes are put on a scientific and intensive basis to suit its topographic features, he was very pleased that one more valuable structure has been built for the population of the county. 
					
					 He highly estimated the efforts exerted by the employees of the farm, noting it is a great success that they have thoroughly established a system for producing piglets of good stock which stand cold in the alpine area and succeeded in raising them.
					
					 He said that the experience gained by the farm clearly proves the validity and vitality of the WPK's policy of stockbreeding which calls for simultaneously developing agriculture and stockbreeding by thoroughly establishing a ring-shape circling production system.
					
					 He set forth highly important tasks that would serve as guidelines for the management and operation of the farm.
					
					 It is necessary to regard it as a iron rule in stockbreeding to establish a system for processing various kinds of meat and by-products while producing meat in order to make the people's diet more bountiful and diverse, he said, specifying the orientation and ways to do so.
					
					 The next leg of his guidance was the Taehongdan Potato Processing Factory honored with the title of the Three-Revolution Red Flag.
					
					 He looked round the room dedicated to the history of the factory and its various production processes to acquaint himself in detail with its technological updating and production.
					
					 He learned in detail about the newly-built potato processing facilities and the machines in operation.
					
					 Watching the clean worksites where cultured practices have been thoroughly established in production and life and varieties of processed potatoes including dehydrated starch noodles, taffies and liquors being churned out in an endless stream from every machine, he was very pleased that it has become possible to supply greater quantities of quality processed potatoes to the population of the county. 
					
					 He set forth tasks to be carried out by the factory for its operation and management. 
					
					 He stressed that in order to boost the production of varieties of tasty processed potatoes meeting people's need it is necessary to deepen the research into potato processing and steadily raise the level of technical skills of its employees in an effort to keep increasing varieties of products. 
					
					 He then moved to the newly built noodle restaurant in Taehongdan-township.
					
					 He went round the interior and exterior of the restaurant built in peculiar style and saw varieties of potato and pork dishes to acquaint himself in detail with its construction and management. 
					
					 Very pleased to learn that the restaurant is very popular among people by serving them diverse tasty and peculiar dishes as well as noodle prepared with potato, speciality of the county, he said this exciting reality of the county, the nation's leading potato producer, once again clearly proves the validity and great vitality of the WPK's policy on bringing about a radical turn in potato farming. 
					
					 He advanced tasks to be carried out by the restaurant for its management and operation, underscoring the need to steadily increase the varieties of potato dishes and improve their qualities to serve people better. 
					
					 Kim Jong Il toured the wonderfully built township of Taehongdan to acquaint himself with its management. 
					
					 He expressed great satisfaction over the fact that the officials, party members and other working people of the county turned its seat into an attractive socialist land of bliss.  
					
					 The county has begun to witness the spectacular appearance of a thriving nation in which the spirit of socialism is running high and people fully enjoy happiness as new leap forward and innovations are being effected in every part of the county everyday, he noted, adding this stirring reality is instilling confidence and optimism about victory into the Korean people dashing ahead towards the eminence of a thriving nation. 
					
					 He expressed great expectation and conviction that the people of the county would perform uninterrupted eye-opening miracles in the efforts to thoroughly implement the Party's policy on bringing about a radical turn in potato farming and thus creditably play the role of vanguard and shock brigade on the agricultural front. 
					
					 He was accompanied by Kim Hi Thaek, chief secretary of the Ryanggang Provincial Committee of the WPK, Secretary Kim Ki Nam, Department Directors Kim Kyong Hui and Jang Song Thaek and First Vice Department Directors Ju Kyu Chang and Ri Je Gang of the WPK Central Committee and Hyon Chol Hae and Ri Myong Su, department directors of the NDC.

articles.title: CPRK Bring Charge against S. Korean Group
articles.content:
CPRK Bring Charge against S. Korean Group
 Pyongyang, May 19 (KCNA) -- The Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea released an indictment Wednesday blasting the south Korean puppet conservative group for its criminal act of having bedeviled the north-south relations since the emergence of its conservative regime in south Korea. 
					 Branding the south Korean puppet conservative group as one of most wicked traitors who bedeviled the north-south relations to serve outsiders, a gang of vicious anti-reunification elements who dampened the nation's desire for reunification, a diehard traitorous clique who scuttled the inter-Korean cooperation and dangerous warmongers keen to bring nuclear war disasters to the Koreans, the indictment cites facts to prove its crimes. 
					
					 No sooner had the conservative group taken office than declared the "theory of prioritizing south Korea-U.S. relations" as a top priority task and the general strategy of its domestic and foreign policies, thus making the inter-Korean relations totally dependent on the south Korea-U.S. relations, the indictment notes, and goes on:
					
					 In over two years of his office the puppet traitor visited his American master, doing only things harmful to the inter-Korean relations. 
					
					 The puppet group malignantly defiled and played down the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, pushing the inter-Korean cooperation to a collapse in the end.
					
					 The smear campaign launched by the puppet group against the DPRK in the wake of the sinking of its warship reached the height of its confrontation and war moves.
					
					 When the above-said accident occurred, the group regarded it as a golden opportunity for pushing the north-south relations to a catastrophe. Making the fiction that the accident "was caused by the north" a fait accompli from its beginning, the group cried out for "countermeasure" and "retaliation". It even went the lengths of talking about not ruling out a war.
					
					 The puppet group is seriously mistaken if it thinks it can weather crisis and prove successful in the upcoming "elections to local self-governing bodies" by misleading the public opinion through such trite campaign as straining the situation and bedeviling the inter-Korean relations.
					
					 The DPRK sets store by the north-south relations but will never tolerate the puppet group's confrontation and war moves. Should the group of traitors ignite a war together with the U.S. at any cost, the DPRK will mete out merciless and resolute punishment to the warmongers, warns the indictment.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Cameroonian President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Cameroonian President
 Pyongyang, May 19 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Monday sent a message of greetings to Paul Biya, president of Cameroon, on the occasion of the 38th birthday of its republic.
					 Expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would further develop, Kim in the message wished the president and the people of Cameroon successes in their work for socio-economic development.

articles.title: Bulgaria's Cyrillic Alphabet Day Marked
articles.content:
Bulgaria's Cyrillic Alphabet Day Marked
Pyongyang, May 19 (KCNA) -- A film show was held at the Taedonggang Diplomatic Corps Club on Wednesday to mark Bulgaria's Cyrillic Alphabet Day.
					 Present there on invitation were Charge d'Affaires a.i. Vihren Nikolov and a staff member of the Bulgarian embassy here.
					
					 Vice-Chairman Ryu Sung Rim and members of the DPRK-Bulgaria Friendship Association and working people in the city of Pyongyang were on hand.
					
					 The participants watched a Bulgarian feature film.

articles.title: Meeting of Officials in Field of Commerce Held
articles.content:
Meeting of Officials in Field of Commerce Held
 Pyongyang, May 19 (KCNA) -- A national meeting of officials in the field of commerce was held in Pyongyang on Tuesday.
					 It was attended by Premier Kim Yong Il, Vice-Premier Pak Myong Son, officials concerned and exemplary commercial workers across the country.
					
					 The meeting reviewed the successes and experience gained in the operation of the teams producing goods by use of various materials in the field of commerce over the past years and discussed tasks and ways to improve this work.
					
					 General Secretary Kim Jong Il clearly indicated the tasks and ways for those teams to mass-produce children's wear and sundry goods for daily use, etc. with unused materials and by-products available from the industrial establishments and provide them to people. 
					
					 The reporter and speakers said that the meeting would mark an important occasion in fully satisfying the increasing need of people for goods and developing the socialist commerce.
					
					 They called on all the officials in the field of commerce to boost the production of varieties of quality and cheap consumer goods and processed food by their own efforts and supply them to people and thus contribute to glorifying this significant year marking the 65th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea as a year bringing prosperity and happiness to the people.

articles.title: Seminar on Plants and Animals Species Conservation Held
articles.content:
Seminar on Plants and Animals Species Conservation Held
 Pyongyang, May 19 (KCNA) -- A seminar on capacity-building of PA management and plants and animals species conservation 
					was held in Pyongyang Wednesday. 
					
					 Present there were officials, scientists and researchers of the Central Committee of the Nature Conservation Union of Korea and other relevant organs and members of the delegation of the Asian Regional Office of the International Union for Conservation of Nature.
					
					 Addresses were made at the seminar by Kim Sun Il, secretary general of the C.C., the Nature Conservation Union of Korea, and Aban Marker Kabraji, director of the IUCN Asian Regional Office.
					
					 They referred to importance and significance of the capacity-building of PA management and plants and animals species conservation and called for swapping the achievements and experience gained in this field at the seminar and strengthening mutual cooperation.
					
					 A briefing on the IUNC was given to be followed by speeches under such titles as "On the management of protection areas in the DPRK" and "On international biosphere reserve in Mt. Kuwol".
					
					 The speakers stressed the need to survey and draw out a classified list of the animals and plants put in peril of extermination due to the global warming and ecological destruction and arouse public interest in their conservation now that the number of those animal and plant species is steadily increasing worldwide.

articles.title: Pyongyang Int'l Trade Fair Goes On
articles.content:
Pyongyang Int'l Trade Fair Goes On
 Pyongyang, May 19 (KCNA) -- The 13th Pyongyang Spring International Trade Fair has been held from May 17.
					 Hundreds of companies from the DPRK, China, Russia, Cuba, Mongolia, Indonesia, Germany, Switzerland, Brazil, Australia and other countries and regions are taking part in the fair.
					
					 More than 200 standard, special and open-air booths, installed at the Three-Revolution Exhibition for the trade fair, are crowded with businessmen, tradesmen, purchasers and others every day.
					
					 Conspicuous in the fair are such exhibits as CNC machine tools, implements, building materials, light industrial goods, foodstuffs, daily necessities and medicines presented by Korean trade companies.
					
					 Domestic utensils, health food and garments exhibited by foreign companies are also attracting attention of visitors.
					
					 During the fair, representatives of the participating companies have discussed possibilities of business through investment conferences and consultative meetings and made some contracts.
					
					 The number of the participants in the ongoing fair is larger and the exhibits are better than those of the previous ones. 
					
					 The fair will continue until May 20.

articles.title: Historic Spring Mingyuegou Meeting
articles.content:
Historic Spring Mingyuegou Meeting
 Pyongyang, May 19 (KCNA) -- The revolutionary struggle can emerge victorious only when revolutionary forces are prepared and closely united to undertake it.
					 The truth shown by the historic spring Mingyuegou meeting has still remained valuable for the Korean people.
					
					 The situation in the early 1930s was grave as it was all during the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle.
					
					 With the beginning of 1931, the Japanese imperialists, availing themselves of the May 30 Uprising organized by factionalists infected with flunkeyism, intensified white terrorism.
					
					 They cracked down the revolutionary forces which revolutionaries and other patriots of Korea had prepared for years with much effort.
					
					 Most of the revolutionary organizations in Jiandao were torn down.
					
					 Having shifted the theatre of his activity to east Manchuria to cope with the prevailing situation, President Kim Il Sung launched efforts to unite the masses strong in revolutionary spirit, rebuilding the revolutionary organizations in the area.
					
					 He convened a meeting of cadres of the party and the Young Communist League in Mingyuegou, Yanji County, in the middle of May Juche 20 (1931).
					
					 At the meeting he made a historic speech, "Let Us Repudiate the 'Left' Adventurist Line and Follow the Revolutionary Organizational Line."
					
					 He in the speech made a profound analysis of the reactionary nature of the May 30 Uprising, the cause of its failure and its consequences and lesson and put forth a revolutionary organizational line on uniting the whole nation into a political force by closely rallying the basic masses and other anti-Japanese forces of all social strata around them.
					
					The all-embracing line was fully supported by the participants in the meeting as it would serve as guidelines in repudiating the "Left" adventurist line and winning over the masses.
					
					 After the meeting the revolutionary organizations in Mingyuegou and Antu were put on the right track in a short span of time and those in other areas revitalized.
					
					 The feats of the President, who prepared and strengthened the Juche-oriented revolutionary forces, are shinning under the Songun revolutionary leadership of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: US Scenario for Military Hegemony Assailed
articles.content:
US Scenario for Military Hegemony Assailed
 Pyongyang, May 19 (KCNA) -- The United States is now busy stockpiling reserve strategic materials and stepping up the development of new type conventional weapons while putting up the signboard of "nuclear disarmament." This is a revelation of its shameless and wild ambition to put the world under its control and domination through high-handed military actions. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday observes this in a signed commentary.
					
					 The U.S. seeks to maintain and strengthen its military domination over the world by modernizing conventional weapons, unbound to any international treaty under the situation where the elimination of nukes has become a demand of the times, the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					 The U.S. ambitious arms buildup sparks off a worldwide arms race, disturbing peace and stability.
					
					 If the waves of this arms race triggered off by the U.S. sweep not a few countries now in the grip of a serious economic crisis, it may bring disastrous consequences to them. By doing so the U.S. seeks to enfeeble its rivals and put them under its control as it pleases. 
					
					 The U.S. is the main architect of arms race and arch criminal seriously threatening and disturbing world peace and stability as it is driving the international community into a vortex of arms race and putting world peace and stability at peril.
					
					 Being chieftain of aggression and war and a cancer-like entity standing in the way of peace, the U.S. will never be able to escape bitterer rebuff and condemnation from the world peace-loving people for its reckless arms race and moves to expand the sphere of its military domination.

articles.title: AINDF Calls for Anti-GNP Struggle
articles.content:
AINDF Calls for Anti-GNP Struggle
 Pyongyang, May 19 (KCNA) -- The Information Bureau of the Central Committee of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front Tuesday issued an appeal to all the people with the "elections to local self-governing bodies" in south Korea just at hand.
					 The elections will prove to be a battle decisive of whether the people throw overboard the anti-reunification and confrontation-minded group by judging the "Grand National Party" (GNP) and the "government" swimming against independence, democracy and reunification or remain slaves under the pro-U.S. dictatorial rule, the appeal said, and went on:
					
					 Now the fascist conservative group is kicking up a whirlwind of "witch hunting"-style suppression under the pretext of public security dating back to the Cold War era in which dissidents were unconditionally labeled "left-wing elements". It goes on such rampage as branding the former "presidents" who signed the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration as "leftist" and setting fire to their graves. The group punishes anyone critical of its unpopular rule on the charge of violation of the "law on elections" in a bid to totally stamp out the progressive forces.
					
					 Even the Lee Myung Bak group deliberately floated the story that the sinking of warship "Cheonan" was caused by the north in a foolish attempt to mislead the mindset of the people and create "a security crisis" for the purpose of weathering out its "election" crisis. 
					
					 Urging all the people in south Korea to judge in unity the dictatorial forces going under the veil of "pragmatism" obsessed by fascism and war and turn out in an all-out struggle to build a new bridgehead in the movement for independence, democracy and reunification, the appeal said: 
					
					 Any vote for the GNP means a ballot inviting self-destruction as it will bring war disasters. 
					
					 The row about the sinking of warship "Cheonan" is a farce carefully orchestrated by the traitorous ruling quarters to cover up the plot to start a war against the DPRK and a fiction about the "north wind" concocted under the signboard of "pragmatism" to deceive and mock at the people.
					
					 Do not be taken in by the deceptive farce of the GNP seeking to benefit from the misinformation about the "north wind"!
					
					 Let us vote for the candidates of the forces standing for progressive reforms irrespective of grouping, political view, affiliation and religious belief!
					
					 Let us force the "government under the guise of pragmatism" to pay for the crimes committed in two and a half years and put a definite end to the ambition of the traitorous party for long-term office through an all-people's resolute decision and firm option!
					
					 Let us open up a new horizon for progress and reforms and bring about a turning phase for peace and reunification by winning a victory in the "elections to local self-governing bodies!"

articles.title: Actions against Dictatorial Regime Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
Actions against Dictatorial Regime Called for in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, May 19 (KCNA) -- Students and members of different organizations in various parts of south Korea staged the May 18 grand march for independent reunification in Kwangju on May 16 on the occasion of the 30th anniversary of the Kwangju Popular Uprising. 
					 The participants declared they would certainly judge the present "government" and the "Grand National Party's" policy against democracy and reunification by inheriting the spirit displayed by the participants in the Kwangju resistance.
					
					 On the same day members of civic and public organizations including the Solidarity for Progress and students organizations also held a people's rally for inheriting the May 18 spirit in Kwangju.  
					
					 If the people pool their efforts, they can hold in check the absolute rule of the present regime and achieve social democracy, the speakers at the rally said, calling for judging the group of traitors in the "elections to the local self-governing bodies."
					
					 On May 15 a workers rally commemorating the 30th anniversary of the May 18 Kwangju resistance was held in Kwangju with the attendance of more than 15,000 unionists including those of the Government Employees' Union.
					
					 Speakers at the rally charged that the authorities' suppression of the labor movement has gone beyond the tolerance limit these days, expressing the will to fight against the dictatorial regime in the spirit displayed by the Kwangju uprisers. 
					
					 Members of different organizations and Kwangju citizens held a meeting on the same day, calling for actions for achieving social democracy.

articles.title: Swiss Committee Hails DPRK's Nuclear Fusion
articles.content:
Swiss Committee Hails DPRK's Nuclear Fusion
 Pyongyang, May 19 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Group for the Study of the Juche Idea of Switzerland issued a joint statement on May 13 in connection with the DPRK's successful nuclear fusion. 
					 The statement said that scientists of the DPRK succeeded in nuclear fusion reaction on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung, thus opening up a new phase in the Juche-oriented and independent development of the latest science and technology of the country and making a definite breakthrough toward the development of safe and environment-friendly energy.
					
					 It noted that the DPRK's successful nuclear fusion dealt a telling blow at the "UN sanctions" applied by the U.S. in a bid to suffocate the DPRK economically, adding that the imperialists can never bring the DPRK to its knees.

articles.title: Mexican Group Issues Bulletin
articles.content:
Mexican Group Issues Bulletin
 Pyongyang, May 19 (KCNA) -- The Mexican Institute for the Study of the Juche Idea issued the 55th issue of its bulletin on the occasions of the 10th anniversary of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and the June 25-July 27 month of anti-U.S. joint struggle.
					 The bulletin in an article titled "Tradition of the Great Unity of the Korean Nation" said the Korean people have deep roots of the great national unity, referring to the fact that President Kim Il Sung founded the Association for the Restoration of the Fatherland, the first anti-Japanese national united front in Korea, on May 5, 1936.
					
					 On the basis of this tradition of the great national unity, the President aroused the people from all walks of life to building a democratic and independent sovereign state and realizing the country's reunification after its liberation, the bulletin noted, and went on:
					
					 He set forth the three principles of national reunification, thus laying a firm foundation for the national unity and the country's reunification.
					
					His idea of great national unity has been successfully carried forward by General Secretary
						 Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Thanks to Kim Jong Il's bold decision, the north-south summit meeting was provided in June 2000, the first of its kind after the division of Korea, which resulted in the adoption and publication of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration in which both sides solemnly committed themselves to the solution of the issue of the country's reunification by the concerted efforts of the Korean nation.
					
					 The north-south summit meeting held in October 2007 culminated in the adoption of the October 4 declaration, a programme for implementing the historic June 15 joint declaration, thus opening up a brighter prospect for Korea's reunification.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il dirige sobre terreno labores de la ciudad de Hyesan
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il dirige sobre terreno labores de la ciudad de Hyesan
Pyongyang, 19 de mayo (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, dirigio sobre el terreno las gestiones de varios sectores de la ciudad de Hyesan de la provincia de Ryanggang.
					Ante todo, recorrio el Monumento a la Victoria de la Batalla de Pochonbo erguido en la colina Koegungjong de esa ciudad.
					
					Luego de recorrer el grupo de esculturas del monumento, en el centro del cual se halla la estatua de bronce del Presidente Kim Il Sung, y la lapida a la actividad historico-revolucionaria, senalo que el es invencible comandante insigne de acero, extraordinario estratega militar y gran hombre sin par y subrayo que sus hazanas realizadas por la liberacion de la patria quedaran para siempre en el corazon del pueblo coreano.
					
					Acto seguido, estuvo en la Fabrica de Acero de Hyesan.
					
					Luego de escuchar la explicacion ante el plano de la fabrica, recorrio el taller de acero, el de laminacion y otros procesos productivos y se mostro muy satisfecho de que los obreros hayan aumentado en el alto nivel la produccion al establecer con las fuerzas y tecnologias propias el solido sistema productivo de acero al estilo coreano, pese a la escasez y dificultades de toda indole.
					
					Indico las tareas para desarrollar la fabrica con vistas al futuro.
					
					La Fabrica de Calzados de Hyesan fue el proximo destino de la visita de orientacion del Dirigente.
					
					Luego de recorrer la sala de presentacion del historial, paso revista al taller de corte, el de costura a maquina y otros talleres informandose del estado de produccion y de equipos tecnicos.
					
					Al ver los zapatos de distintas formas de buena calidad producidos en los modernos procesos remodelados tecnicamente, evaluo altamente a los funcionarios, obreros y tecnicos de la fabrica calificando de muy loable el hecho de que ellos producen muchos zapatos de invierno de buena calidad, incluyendo las botas enguatadas, y los suministran a los habitantes de la provincia. 
					
					Al final, enumero las tareas que se presentan ante la fabrica.  
					
					El Dirigente visito luego la Universidad Pedagogica Kim Jong Suk.
					
					Guiado por los funcionarios directivos del plantel docente, el recorrio la sala de presentacion del historial. 
					
					Dijo que tanto en el pasado como en el presente los graduados de esa universidad juegan el papel nuclear en la rama docente.
					
					Muy satisfecho de que la universidad haya cumplido el papel vanguardista en la lucha por consolidar el mas ventajoso sistema pedagogico de nuestro pais al formar muchos profesores competentes con fuerte temple revolucionario y gran capacidad didactica, evaluo de altos los meritos de los profesores, empleados y estudiantes realizados por el partido, la revolucion, la patria y el pueblo. 
					
					 Acto seguido, el Dirigente recorrio varios lugares incluso la sala de estudio de metodos de ensenanza enterandose en detalles de la situacion de educacion.
					
					 Al ver el recinto ordenado y dispuesto de todas las instalaciones de educacion, se puso muy contento de que la universidad formara a los estudiantes en un magnifico ambiente educativo como maestros competentes preparados de modo polifacetico y aprecio mucho los meritos de los profesores y empleados. 
					
					 El Dirigente enseno las tareas que incumben a la universidad. 
					
					 Luego, se reunio con los educadores benemeritos, quienes contribuyeron al desarrollo de la educacion del pais trabajando largo tiempo en la universidad y dedicando todos sus esfuerzos psiquicos y fisicos a la educacion de las generaciones venideras, les estimulo cordialmente y se fotografio junto a ellos. 
					
					 Ese dia, el Dirigente recorrio la ciudad de Hyesan y presento las tareas para la construccion urbana. 
					
					 Acondicionar bien la ciudad de Hyesan, puerta del monte Paektu, reviste suma importancia para hacer brillar las gloriosas tradiciones revolucionarias de nuestro partido, dijo e ilumino concretamente el rumbo y remedios para realizar con vistas al futuro la construccion urbana. 
					
					 Le acompanaron el secretario responsable del Comite del PTC en la Provincia de Ryanggang, Kim Hi Thaek, el secretario del CC del PTC, Kim Ki Nam, los jefes de departamento del CC del PTC, Kim Kyong Hui y Jang Song Thaek, los primeros subjefes de departamento del CC del PTC, Ju Kyu Chang y Ri Je Gang, y los jefes de departamento del CDN, Hyon Chol Hae y Ri Myong Su.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il dirige sobre terreno el distrito de Taehongdan
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il dirige sobre terreno el distrito de Taehongdan
Pyongyang, 19 de mayo (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, dirigio sobre el terreno el distrito de Taehongdan de la provincia de Ryanggang.
					 Ante todo, el Dirigente estuvo en la Granja Porcina Paeksan adscrita al Comite de Gestion Agricola del distrito de Taehongdan.
					
					 Tras  escuchar la explicacion ante el plano de la granja, se entero en detalles del estado de construccion, equipos tecnicos y de cria y cuidado de puercos recorriendo el interior y exterior de la granja.
					
					 Se mostro satisfecho de que los funcionarios y los empleados de esa empresa convirtieron con sus propias fuerzas y tecnicas durante corto espacio de tiempo la granja en la base moderna de produccion de carne de puerco y evaluo altamente los meritos de ellos que trabajaron con abnegacion para la prosperidad de la patria.
					
					 Senalo que la Granja Porcina Paeksan deviene la base moderna de produccion de carne en que la calidad de construccion se aseguro en alto nivel y se aplicaron a todo el proceso la cientifizacion y la intensificacion conforme a la peculiaridad zonal, y se alegro mucho de que se haya preparado un nuevo tesoro precioso para los habitantes.
					
					 Haber establecido cabalmente el sistema de produccion de lechon de raza superior resistente al frio de la zona montanosa y logrado el exito en el metodo de cria y cuidado son grandes exitos, dijo el Dirigente y elogio mucho los esfuerzos de los empleados.
					
					 Destaco que las experiencias alcanzadas por la granja comprueban evidentemente la justeza y la vitalidad de la politica de la ganaderia del PTC de desarrollar a la vez la agricultura y la cria de ganado al establecer estrictamente el sistema de produccion de circulacion de tipo anular.
					
					 Presento las tareas programaticas que sirven de guia en la gestion de la granja.
					
					 Para asegurar la vida alimentaria mas abundante y variada al pueblo, es preciso tomar por el principio rigido infalible de la ganaderia el establecimiento del sistema de la elaboracion de carne y materias residuales junto con la produccion de carne, apunto y presento el rumbo y remedios detallados para realizarlo.  
					
					 El Dirigente dirigio la Fabrica de Elaboracion de Patata de Taehongdan que recibio la Bandera Roja de Tres Revoluciones.
					
					Averiguo detalladamente el estado de reconstruccion tecnica y de produccion recorriendo la sala de presentacion del historial y varios procesos de produccion.
					
					 En particular, se cercioro concretamente del funcionamiento de los equipos y maquinas instalados en los procesos de elaboracion de patata nuevamente construidos.
					
					 Al contemplar los talleres limpios, donde esta garantizada la cultura de produccion y vida, y la salida en cadena de varios productos elaborados de patata como fideo de almidon, melaza y licor desde las maquinas, expreso su gran satisfaccion diciendo que ya se puede suministrar al pueblo del distrito muchos alimentos de buena calidad, cuya materia prima es la patata.
					
					 Presento las tareas para la administracion de la fabrica.
					
					 Subrayo que para producir mucha cantidad de diversos alimentos sabrosos de patata procesada conforme a la demanda del pueblo, se debe profundizar la investigacion sobre el particular y aumentar sin cesar las variedades elevando constantemente la calificacion de los empleados.
					
					 Acto seguido, visito el restaurante de fideo construido nuevamente en la cabecera distrital de Taehongdan.
					
					 Luego de pasar revista al interior y exterior del restaurante construido originalmente, se informo minuciosamente del estado de construccion y gestion examinando diversos platos de patata y carne de puerco.
					
					 Se mostro muy contento cuando se entero de que el restaurante es aplaudido por los habitantes por ofrecer el fideo y otros platos originales de buena calidad, todos hechos con la patata, producto especial del distrito. 
					
					 Indico que el panorama peculiar que da el distrito de Taehongdan, una de las bases productivas de patata, vuelve a comprobar patentemente la justeza e inagotable vitalidad de la orientacion del partido de levantar una innovacion en el cultivo de la patata. 
					
					Presento las tareas que se presentan en la operacion del restaurante subrayando la necesidad de mejorar el servicio a los habitantes diversificando mas los platos de patata y elevando constantemente su calidad.
					
					Acto seguido, se informo de la situacion de urbanizacion dando vueltas por la cabecera distrital de Taehongdan, acondicionada magnificamente.
					
					Se puso muy contento de que los funcionarios, militantes del partido y trabajadores del distrito hayan transformado la cabecera en un paraiso socialista que despeja la mente solo al verlo.
					
					En todas partes del distrito se crean cada dia nuevos saltos e innovaciones, se palpa el impetu socialista y se comenzo a ver el maravilloso aspecto de la gran potencia prospera en que inundan las felicidades del pueblo, senalo. 
					
					Continuo que esa realidad maravillosa infunde la fe y el optimismo de la victoria al pueblo coreano que avanza de viento en popa hacia la cima de la gran potencia prospera.
					
					Finalmente, expreso su gran esperanza y conviccion de que los habitantes distritales cumpliran excelentemente con su papel de vanguardia del sector agricola al seguir creando milagros esplendidos en la lucha por materializar cabalmente la orientacion del partido de registrar una revolucion en el cultivo de patata.
					
					En esta ocasion el Dirigente fue acompanado por el secretario responsable del Comite del Partido del Trabajo de Corea en la Provincia de Ryanggang, Kim Hi Thaek, el secretario del CC del PTC, Kim Ki Nam, los jefes de departamento del CC del PTC, Kim Kyong Hui y Jang Song Thaek, los primeros subjefes del CC del PTC, Ju Kyu Chang y Ri Je Gang, y los jefes de departamento del Comite de Defensa Nacional, Hyon Chol Hae y Ri Myong Su.

articles.title: CRPP acusa los crimenes de la banda de titeres surcoreanos
articles.content:
CRPP acusa los crimenes de la banda de titeres surcoreanos
Pyongyang, 19 de mayo (ATCC) -- El Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria (CRPP) hizo publica el dia 19 un acta de acusacion revelando los crimenes del "poder" conservador del Sur de Corea que desde su aparicion hasta la fecha, ha venido destruyendo las relaciones Norte-Sur.
					 Los titeres conservadores surcoreanos son los traidores mas malvados y belicistas que vendieron las relaciones Norte-Sur a las fuerzas foraneas, pisotearon flagrantemente el deseo de la nacion sobre la reunificacion, impidieron los proyectos de cooperacion Norte-Sur y buscan los desastres de guerra nuclear en detrimento de la nacion coreana, senala el documento y prosigue:
					
					 Tan pronto como tomara el "poder", esa banda, al presentar la "teoria de dar prioridad a las relaciones Sur de Corea-Estados Unidos", la proclamo como tarea primordial y estrategia general de su politica interior y exterior convirtiendo asi las relaciones Norte-Sur en las sujetas a los vinculos con EE.UU.
					
					 En dos anos y pico de su mandato, el traidor titere hizo todo lo que perjudicara las relaciones intercoreanas en sus visitas a su amo gringo.
					
					 Esa banda desvirtuo perversamente la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre poniendo fin a las labores de cooperacion Norte-Sur.
					
					 La campana intrigante librada por los titeres en cuanto al caso de hundimiento de un buque de marina surcoreana fue el climax de sus maniobras en busca de confrontacion y guerra.
					
					 Al tomar ese caso por la oportunidad magnifica para llevar a la catastrofe las relaciones con el Norte, ellos abogaron por la "represalia" y "venganza" considerando desde el principio como hecho probado que el "Norte fue el que hundio el barco" y ahora pretenden desencadenar hasta la guerra.
					
					 Sera una gran equivocacion si esa banda piensa que podria liberarse de la crisis y sacar algun provecho en las inmediatas "elecciones de autonomia local" induciendo en error la opinion publica mediante su metodo rutinario de agravar la tension y destruir las relaciones con el Norte.
					
					 Si bien la RPDC aprecia las relaciones con el Sur, no tolerara jamas las maniobras de la banda surcoreana por el enfrentamiento y la guerra.
					
					 Si ella enciende al fin y al cabo la mecha de la guerra junto con EE.UU., le responderemos con un castigo implacable y tajante.

articles.title: Encuentro de amistad en embajada china
articles.content:
Encuentro de amistad en embajada china 
Pyongyang, 19 de mayo (ATCC) -- Liu Hongcai, embajador de la Republica Popular China en Corea, ofrecio el dia 18 en su sede diplomatica un encuentro de amistad para felicitar el exito de la historica visita a China del Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					Fueron invitados al acto vicepresidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y ministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares Kim Yong Chun, el secretario del CC del Partido del Trabajo de Corea (PTC) Choe Thae Bok, los jefes de departamento del CC del PTC Kim Yong Il y Kim Yang Gon, el jefe del Departamento de Asuntos extranjeros del Comite de Defensa Nacional Jon Hui Jong, los subjefes de departamento del CC del PTC Kim Song Nam y Ri Yong Chol y otros funcionarios coreanos.
					
					Tambien estuvieron presentes los miembros de la embajada china.
					
					Liu, en su discurso, senalo que la reciente visita a China del Secretario General Kim Jong Il sirvio de importante motivo en el mayor desarrollo de las tradicionales relaciones de amistad entre los partidos y los pueblos de China y Corea y se registrara con brillantez en la historia de las relaciones de ambos paises.
					
					Destaco que el partido y el gobierno de China, junto con el partido y el gobierno de Corea, contribuiran a llevar a una nueva etapa alta tales relaciones, ofrecer el bienestar a los pueblos de los dos paises y lograr la paz y coprosperidad de la region y expreso conviccion de que el pueblo coreano, bajo la direccion del PTC encabezado por el Secretario General Kim Jong Il, l. obtendra mayores exitos en la construccion de una gran potencia prospera.
					
					Choe, en su intervencion, se refirio a que en China marchan bien todas las cosas y se fortalece mas el poderio nacional y deseo al pueblo chino mayores exitos en su lucha ulterior.
					
					Consolidar de generacion en generacion la amistad Corea-China es la inconmovible posicion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y el gobierno de la RPDC, senalo y destaco que se esforzara tambien en el futuro por hacer florecer el jardin de la amistad entre Corea y China junto con los companeros chinos.
					
					Los participantes profundizaron el sentimiento de amistad departiendo sobre el mayor desarrollo de las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre ambos paises.

articles.title: Sesionada reunion nacional de los funcionarios comerciales
articles.content:
Sesionada reunion nacional de los funcionarios comerciales
Pyongyang, 19 de mayo (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 18 en esta capital la reunion nacional de los funcionarios de la rama de comercio.
					 A la cita asistieron el premier del Consejo de Ministros Kim Yong Il, la vicepremier Pak Myong Son, cuadros y funcionarios ejemplares de la rama de diferentes localidades del pais.
					
					 Los participantes hicieron balance de los exitos y experiencias logrados en el pasado en la operacion de los equipos de produccion de articulos de consumo masivo y discutieron las tareas y remedios para mejorar y fortalecer esta labor.
					
					 El Dirigente Kim Jong Il aclaro las tareas y remedios para suministrar en gran cantidad los vestidos de ninos y los articulos miscelaneos de uso diario, producidos en dichos equipos utilizando los materiales ociosos y los derivados de las fabricas y empresas.
					
					 Los oradores dijeron que esta reunion marcara un importante hito para satisfacer la creciente demanda del pueblo sobre las mercancias y desarrollar el comercio socialista.
					
					 Enfatizaron que todos los funcionarios del dominio comercial deben producir y suministrar con las fuerzas propias mucho mas articulos de consumo de buena calidad y baratos y los alimentos elaborados para contribuir a hacer de este ano significativo del 65o aniversario de la fundacion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea el ano en que inunda la felicidad del pueblo.
